entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Norman Wells Airport 3:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -28.8°C

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
